getDelegationGrtValue(address).details: Returns the delegated + undelegated grtValue of a delegation

getIndexers().details: Returns the array of indexers the delegator has delegated to

returns._0: indexers_ The array of indexers delegated to

isDelegatorTo(address).details: Return whether the delegator has delegated to the indexer.

params._actionData: Encoded data to execute the action

getDebtAssets().notice: Retrieves the debt assets (negative value) of the external position

getManagedAssets().notice: Retrieves the managed assets (positive value) of the external position

receiveCallFromVault(bytes).notice: Receives and executes a call from the Vault
